instructions: Determine where in the email you want the pictures or videos to be placed. When you find it, tap and hold that area. Select Insert Photo or Video from the pop-up menu. You might have to tap one of the menu arrow buttons to find it. Browse through your phone until you find the file you want to attach, then select Choose . Repeat these first three steps until you finish attaching images or videos to the email. Finish editing the email, then choose Send to email the photos or videos.

Open the Photos app. Open the album that has the images or videos you want to email. Tap Select at the top, then choose the files you want to send over email. Select the Share button on the bottom menu, then choose Mail , or choose Email if you're not using a modern version of iOS . Fill out the email like normal, then tap Send to email the photos and videos.
